languages.text: Кризис в Просторе нанес удар деловым интересам Пустотного братства. Не имея влиятельных союзников, они отступали во тьму пограничных систем. Тамошняя тяжелая жизнь ковала из них новое племя людей — свирепых, диких, готовых на все ради выживания. И поклявшихся однажды вернуться и взять свое.
languages.translation_comment: Не максимальная репутация с Пустотным братством

languages.text: The crisis in the Expanse dealt a serious blow to the business interests of the Fellowship of the Void. Having no powerful allies, they retreated into the darkness of frontier systems. The hard life they faced there forged them into a new tribe — furious, wild, and willing to do anything for survival. They swore to return and retake what had once been theirs.
languages.original_text: Кризис в Просторе нанес удар деловым интересам Пустотного братства. Не имея влиятельных союзников, они отступали во тьму пограничных систем. Тамошняя тяжелая жизнь ковала из них новое племя людей — свирепых, диких, готовых на все ради выживания. И поклявшихся однажды вернуться и взять свое.

traits.locale_text: The Crisis in the Expanse dealt a serious blow to the business interests of the Fellowship of the Void. Having no powerful allies, they retreated into the darkness of borderline systems. They were met with a hard life that forged them into a new tribe of men — furious, wild, and willing to do anything to survive. And those men swore to return and retake what once was theirs.

The Crisis in the Expanse dealt a serious blow to the business interests of the Fellowship of the Void. Having no powerful allies, they retreated into the darkness of borderline systems. They were met with a hard life that forged them into a new tribe of men — furious, wild, and willing to do anything to survive. And those men swore to return and retake what once was theirs.

The crisis in the Expanse dealt a serious blow to the business interests of the Fellowship of the Void. Having no powerful allies, they retreated into the darkness of frontier systems. They were met with a hard life that forged them into a new tribe — furious, wild, and willing to do anything for survival. They swore to return and retake what once was theirs.

The crisis in the Expanse dealt a serious blow to the business interests of the Fellowship of the Void. Having no powerful allies, they retreated into the darkness of frontier systems. They were met with a hard life that forged them into a new tribe — furious, wild, and willing to do anything for survival. They swore to return and retake what once was theirs.

The crisis in the Expanse dealt a serious blow to the business interests of the Fellowship of the Void. Having no powerful allies, they retreated into the darkness of frontier systems. The hard life they faced there forged them into a new tribe — furious, wild, and willing to do anything for survival. They swore to return and retake what had once been theirs.

The crisis in the Expanse dealt a serious blow to the business interests of the Fellowship of the Void. Having no powerful allies, they retreated into the darkness of frontier systems. The hard life they faced there forged them into a new tribe — furious, wild, and willing to do anything for survival. They swore to return and retake what had once been theirs.

languages.text: 科罗努斯扩区的危机严重打击了虚空协联的商业利益。由于缺少强大的盟友，他们不得不撤到黑暗的边缘星系。艰苦的生活将他们锻炼成了全新的部落民，他们愤怒而狂野，为了生存不择手段。他们发誓，总有一天要卷土重来，夺回曾属于他们的土地。
languages.original_text: The crisis in the Expanse dealt a serious blow to the business interests of the Fellowship of the Void. Having no powerful allies, they retreated into the darkness of frontier systems. The hard life they faced there forged them into a new tribe — furious, wild, and willing to do anything for survival. They swore to return and retake what had once been theirs.

traits.locale_text: 科罗努斯扩区的危机严重打击了虚空协联的商业利益。由于缺少强大的盟友，他们不得不撤到黑暗的边缘星系。艰苦的生活将他们锻炼成了全新的部落民，他们愤怒而狂野，为了生存不择手段。他们发誓，总有一天要卷土重来，夺回曾属于他们的土地。

languages.text: Die Krise in der Ausdehnung war ein schwerer Schlag für die Geschäfte der Gefährten der Leere. Da sie keine mächtigen Verbündeten besaßen, zogen sie sich in die Dunkelheit von Grenzsystemen zurück. Dort erwartete sie ein hartes Leben, das sie zu einem neuen Stamm zusammenschweißte — zornig, wild und zu allem bereit, um zu überleben. Sie schworen, eines Tages zurückzukehren und sich zurückzuholen, was einst ihnen gehört hatte.
languages.original_text: The crisis in the Expanse dealt a serious blow to the business interests of the Fellowship of the Void. Having no powerful allies, they retreated into the darkness of frontier systems. The hard life they faced there forged them into a new tribe — furious, wild, and willing to do anything for survival. They swore to return and retake what had once been theirs.

traits.locale_text: Die Krise in der Ausdehnung war ein schwerer Schlag für die Geschäfte der Gefährten der Leere. Da sie keine mächtigen Verbündeten besaßen, zogen sie sich in die Dunkelheit von Grenzsystemen zurück. Dort erwartete sie ein hartes Leben, das sie zu einem neuen Stamm zusammenschweißte — zornig, wild und zu allem bereit, um zu überleben. Sie schworen, eines Tages zurückzukehren und sich zurückzuholen, was einst ihnen gehört hatte.

languages.text: La crise dans les Étendues nuisit considérablement aux intérêts commerciaux de la Communauté du vide. Sans allié de poids, elle se retira dans les ténèbres des systèmes frontaliers. La vie difficile qu'elle y trouva en fit une nouvelle tribu : furieuse, sauvage et prête à tout pour survivre. Ses membres jurèrent de revenir reprendre ce qui leur appartenait autrefois.
languages.original_text: The crisis in the Expanse dealt a serious blow to the business interests of the Fellowship of the Void. Having no powerful allies, they retreated into the darkness of frontier systems. The hard life they faced there forged them into a new tribe — furious, wild, and willing to do anything for survival. They swore to return and retake what had once been theirs.

traits.locale_text: La crise dans les Étendues nuisit considérablement aux intérêts commerciaux de la Communauté du vide. Sans allié de poids, elle se retira dans les ténèbres des systèmes frontaliers. La vie difficile qu'elle y trouva en fit une nouvelle tribu : furieuse, sauvage et prête à tout pour survivre. Ses membres jurèrent de revenir reprendre ce qui était leur appartenait autrefois.

languages.text: La crisis de la Extensión supuso un duro golpe para los intereses comerciales de la Hermandad del Vacío. Sin el apoyo de aliados poderosos, se retiraron a la oscuridad de los sistemas fronterizos. La dura vida a la que se enfrentaron allí los convirtió en una nueva tribu, furiosa, salvaje y dispuesta a hacer lo que fuera necesario para sobrevivir. Juraron volver para reclamar lo que antes era suyo.
languages.original_text: The crisis in the Expanse dealt a serious blow to the business interests of the Fellowship of the Void. Having no powerful allies, they retreated into the darkness of frontier systems. The hard life they faced there forged them into a new tribe — furious, wild, and willing to do anything for survival. They swore to return and retake what had once been theirs.

traits.locale_text: La crisis de la Extensión supuso un duro golpe para los intereses comerciales de la Hermandad del Vacío. Sin el apoyo de aliados poderosos, se retiraron a la oscuridad de los sistemas fronterizos. Se enfrentaron a una vida dura que los convirtió en una nueva tribu, furiosa, salvaje y dispuesta a hacer lo que fuera necesario para sobrevivir. Juraron volver para reclamar lo que antes era suyo.

languages.text: エクスパンスの危機は、虚空の仲間のビジネスに深刻な打撃を与えた。強力な同盟者を持たない彼らは、辺境星系の暗闇に引きこもった。直面することになった過酷な生活により、彼らは猛烈で荒々しく、生存のためなら手段を選ばない新たな部族へと鍛え上げた。彼らは、かつて自分たちのものであったものを取り戻すことを誓った。
languages.original_text: The crisis in the Expanse dealt a serious blow to the business interests of the Fellowship of the Void. Having no powerful allies, they retreated into the darkness of frontier systems. The hard life they faced there forged them into a new tribe — furious, wild, and willing to do anything for survival. They swore to return and retake what had once been theirs.

traits.locale_text: エクスパンスの危機は、虚空の仲間のビジネスに深刻な打撃を与えた。強力な同盟者を持たない彼らは、辺境星系の暗闇に引きこもった。直面することになった過酷な生活により、彼らは猛烈で荒々しく、生存のためなら手段を選ばない新たな部族へと鍛え上げた。彼らは、かつて自分たちのものであったものを取り戻すことを誓った。

languages.text: Enginlik'teki kriz, Uçsuz Kardeşliği'nin çıkarlarına ciddi bir darbe vurdu. Güçlü bir müttefikleri olmadığından sınır sistemlerinin karanlığına çekilmek zorunda kaldılar. Orada karşı karşıya kaldıkları zorlu yaşam, yeni bir kabile kurmalarına öncü oldu. Öfkeli, vahşi ve hayatta kalmak için her şeyi yapabilen bir kabile... Bir gün geri dönmeye ve bir zamanlar onların olanı geri almaya yemin ettiler.
languages.original_text: The crisis in the Expanse dealt a serious blow to the business interests of the Fellowship of the Void. Having no powerful allies, they retreated into the darkness of frontier systems. The hard life they faced there forged them into a new tribe — furious, wild, and willing to do anything for survival. They swore to return and retake what had once been theirs.

traits.locale_text: Enginlik'teki kriz Uçsuz Kardeşliği'nin çıkarlarına ciddi bir darbe vurdu. Güçlü bir müttefike sahip olmadıkları için sınır sistemlerinin karanlığına çekilmek zorunda kaldılar. Orada karşı karşıya kaldıkları zorlu yaşam, yeni bir kabile kurmalarına sebebiyet verdi. Öfkeli, vahşi ve hayatta kalmak için her şeyi yapabilen bir kabile. Bir gün geri dönmeye ve bir zamanlar onların olanı geri almaya yemin ettiler.

languages.translation_comment: Не максимальная репутация с Пустотным братством
